data.lyric:
[ti:Heaven On Earth (Explicit)]
[ar:Kid Cudi]
[al:Man On The Moon III: The Chosen (Explicit)]
[by:]

[00:00.00]Heaven On Earth - Kid Cudi
[00:01.92]Lyrics by：Anthony Kilhoffer/DST The Danger/Scott Mescudi
[00:03.85]Composed by：Anthony Kilhoffer/DST The Danger/Scott Mescudi
[00:05.78]Hear me out
[00:08.84]Here we go
[00:14.32]Get it
[00:24.09]Hmm mm
[00:28.31]No I ain't got time for no f**kers no fakes
[00:30.97]Rager mode see I'm stuck in my ways
[00:32.76]Strappin' in with the troops and my syndicate
[00:34.64]Swear to God get the f**k out my face n***a
[00:36.83]Yeah
[00:37.34]At it we kill 'em we clean 'em up
[00:39.09]Tell these n***as they finished no eulogy
[00:40.99]This the s**t they been missin' now raise 'em high
[00:42.79]Been doin' it doin' it doin' it
[00:44.57]Perfect perfect
[00:45.38]Wanted the lights my whole life
[00:46.61]Yeah
[00:47.03]Coulda gonе bad could be trife
[00:48.48]Lotta good n***as got caught in the fight
[00:50.16]N***a
[00:50.76]No this ain't cinema psych
[00:52.03]Yeah
[00:52.45]Realest of realest now off in the night
[00:54.40]Catchin' him pullin' up
[00:55.90]I might be hoppin' out with somethin' fit she thick
[00:58.20]My b***h she murder 'em
[00:59.65]In the city this is rock and roll
[01:02.61]My n***a it's big business the people's only hope
[01:06.36]We ridin' around the city this is rock and roll
[01:09.79]You seein' this fine woman don't f**k with messy h*es
[01:13.71]Don't embellish it's hellish we in the strongest of men catch us on the throne
[01:17.21]Right
[01:18.01]Yeah Yeah yeah yeah yo
[01:21.69]Heaven on Earth I am curious yeah I'm livin' I'll ride til' I'm gone
[01:24.51]Right
[01:25.51]Nice Yeah yeah n***a what
[01:28.78]Don't embellish it's hellish we in the strongest of men catch us on the throne
[01:31.86]Right
[01:32.93]Yes Yeah yeah mm uh
[01:36.23]Heaven on Earth I am curious yeah I'm livin' I'll ride til' I'm gone
[01:39.23]Right
[01:39.75]Sh Yeah sha sh sha
[01:44.42]See just what you see in a n***a life
[01:47.40]Searchin' in these streets what I need I'ma roll the dice
[01:51.95]Demons they will creep zonin 2 a.m.
[01:54.57]God
[01:55.17]Please watch over me please watch over me
[01:58.33]Heaven
[01:58.77]Tell 'em all
[01:59.59]N***a no justice no peace no dealin' with drama
[02:01.76]Can't help that I worry mom
[02:03.43]N***a hop off of the leash here we go
[02:05.23]Drop the bomb
[02:05.83]Ain't no thing in this world that can keep me from peace but me
[02:08.19]Here I am look a star
[02:09.84]Animal thanking myself for my sacrifice Woof cut the lights low
[02:13.37]He don't fold
[02:14.31]My girl look pretty she sippin' merlot
[02:16.14]Hand me my Fronto my tree and my roll up my kit
[02:18.42]Precision I do this like so
[02:19.78]You already know ho bulls**t can't f**k up my flow
[02:23.74]Yeah
[02:24.05]The devil is out and he's on to me but my angels protectin' my soul
[02:27.25]Yeah
[02:28.20]In the city this is rock and roll
[02:31.31]My n***a it's big business the people's only hope
[02:34.89]We ridin' around the city this is rock and roll
[02:38.53]You seein' this fine woman don't f**k with messy h*es
[02:42.37]Don't embellish it's hellish we in the strongest of men catch us on the throne
[02:45.79]Right
[02:46.85]Yeah Yeah yeah yeah yo
[02:50.23]Heaven on Earth I am curious yeah I'm livin' I'll ride til' I'm gone
[02:53.06]Right
[02:53.69]Nice Yeah yeah n***a what
[02:57.33]Don't embellish it's hellish we in the strongest of men catch us the throne
[03:00.45]Right
[03:01.42]Yes Yeah yeah mm uh
[03:04.80]Heaven on Earth I am curious yeah I'm livin' I'll ride til' I'm gone
[03:07.80]Right
[03:08.88]Sh Yeah sha sh sha
data.trans:
[ti:Heaven On Earth (Explicit)]
[ar:Kid Cudi]
[al:Man On The Moon III: The Chosen (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.92]//
[00:03.85]//
[00:05.78]听我说完
[00:08.84]我们开始吧
[00:14.32]志在必得
[00:24.09]//
[00:28.31]我没时间理会这些混蛋 不会弄虚作假
[00:30.97]狂怒模式 看着我进退维谷
[00:32.76]全副武装 与我的团队一起行动
[00:34.64]对着上帝发誓 离开我的视线范围 哥们
[00:36.83]//
[00:37.34]忙个不停 我们把他们杀个片甲不留
[00:39.09]告诉这些哥们 他们死到临头 不需要悼词
[00:40.99]这是他们思念的东西 现在让他们兴奋无比
[00:42.79]坚持不懈
[00:44.57]无可挑剔
[00:45.38]我这一生都想熠熠生辉
[00:46.61]//
[00:47.03]可能变得坏 可能会身处困境
[00:48.48]许多善良的人遭受伤害
[00:50.16]哥们
[00:50.76]这不是拍电影 疯子
[00:52.03]//
[00:52.45]最真实的人 现在趁着夜色离开
[00:54.40]看见他停下车子
[00:55.90]我可能会穿着华服走下车 她性感丰满
[00:58.20]我的妹子干掉他们
[00:59.65]在城市里 这就是招摇过市
[01:02.61]我的朋友 这是一桩大生意 人们唯一的希望
[01:06.36]我们在城里驰骋 这就是招摇过市
[01:09.79]你看着这个漂亮女人 不要跟这些乱七八糟的妹子厮混
[01:13.71]不要美化 我们无惧艰险 最强大的人 问鼎王座
[01:17.21]对吗
[01:18.01]//
[01:21.69]人间天堂 我好奇不已 我朝气蓬勃 我奋勇拼搏 直到我离去
[01:24.51]对吗
[01:25.51]无与伦比 哥们 什么
[01:28.78]不要美化 我们无惧艰险 最强大的人 问鼎王座
[01:31.86]对吗
[01:32.93]//
[01:36.23]人间天堂 我好奇不已 我朝气蓬勃 我奋勇拼搏 直到我离去
[01:39.23]对吗
[01:39.75]//
[01:44.42]就像你看见普通人的生活那样
[01:47.40]在街头寻找 我需要什么 我孤注一掷
[01:51.95]凌晨2点 恶魔会潜入街区
[01:54.57]上帝啊
[01:55.17]请守护我 请守护我
[01:58.33]天堂
[01:58.77]告诉所有人
[01:59.59]哥们 没有正义 没有和平 没时间胡闹
[02:01.76]我忍不住担心 妈妈
[02:03.43]哥们 挣脱束缚 我们开始吧
[02:05.23]投下炸弹
[02:05.83]除了我自己以外 这世上没什么可以让我无法找到平静
[02:08.19]我在这里 听着 一位巨星
[02:09.84]如动物一般疯狂 感谢我做出的牺牲 调暗灯光
[02:13.37]他不会屈服
[02:14.31]我的女孩美丽动人 她啜饮着葡萄酒
[02:16.14]把好货递给我 把装备递给我
[02:18.42]精确无误 我就是这样
[02:19.78]你已经知道 流言蜚语奈何不了我
[02:23.74]//
[02:24.05]恶魔出动 他对我紧追不舍 但是我的天使守护着我的灵魂
[02:27.25]//
[02:28.20]在城市里 这就是招摇过市
[02:31.31]我的朋友 这是一桩大生意 人们唯一的希望
[02:34.89]我们在城里驰骋 这就是招摇过市
[02:38.53]你看着这个漂亮女人 不要跟这些肮脏的妹子厮混
[02:42.37]不要美化 我们无惧艰险 最强大的人 问鼎王座
[02:45.79]对吗
[02:46.85]//
[02:50.23]人间天堂 我好奇不已 我朝气蓬勃 我奋勇拼搏 直到我离去
[02:53.06]对吗
[02:53.69]无与伦比 哥们 什么
[02:57.33]不要美化 我们无惧艰险 最强大的人 问鼎王座
[03:00.45]对吗
[03:01.42]//
[03:04.80]人间天堂 我好奇不已 我朝气蓬勃 我奋勇拼搏 直到我离去
[03:07.80]对吗
[03:08.88]//
